title: SoC Correlation Product Engineer
summary: Do you love crafting sophisticated solutions to highly complex challenges? Do you intrinsically see the importance in every detail? As part of our Silicon Technologies group, you’ll help design and manufacture our next-generation, high-performance, power-efficient processor, system-on-chip (SoC). Joining this group means you’ll be responsible for crafting and building the technology that operates Apple’s devices. Together, you and your team will enable our customers to do all the things they love with their devices. We promote innovation and new technology.
description:
-  Perform measurements that directly impact SoC power & performance for various next generation products.
-  Work on groundbreaking technologies & new designs and collaborate with multiple multi-functional teams including design, validation, test, manufacturing, system test & software to identify issues and implement corrective actions.
-  Work closely with ATE and software teams to identify & develop case tests, benchmarks to be used in production testing, and characterization.
-  Characterize multiple test setups, correlate to ATE and optimize production screening guardband for each system individually.
-  Define characterization plans, perform statistical data analysis and drive correlation & data reviews across multiple cross-functional teams and sign off on all silicon characterization activities.
-  Multi-task and manage multiple programs at different stages.
-  Central point of contact for multiple teams with direct impact on product.
key_qualifications:
Experience with system level characterization using functional / virus like worst case use cases & correlating to ATE.
Understanding of PDN impact on Vmin, ATE test content, system level test programs/ functional content and test hardware.
Experience working with and driving cross functional teams.
Statistical data analysis tools to perform high volume characterization & production data analysis.
5+ years meaningful experience.
Experience in scripting (Python, JMP, PERL etc.) is a plus.
education_experience: Bachelor's degree and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience.
